backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, admin roles, and contact request submission and retrieval with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI update adding a Cash App donation line in the footer.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, config, and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting the document structure and loading the React app.
frontend/RUN-LOCAL-AND-DEPLOY-IC.md: Guide explaining how to run the site locally and deploy it to the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring all sections together, managing selected episodes, and providing query context.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Displays the series synopsis using content from the site configuration.
frontend/src/components/AdminSection.tsx: Admin dashboard for authentication, viewing/exporting contact requests, toggling request status, and granting admin roles.
frontend/src/components/CharactersSectio: Renders character cards with metadata, conditional images, and bios using config-driven data.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: A contact form component with validation, mutation submission, and toast notifications.
Displays a clickable list of episodes and notifies parent when one is selected.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright, YouTube link, and donation info.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, title, tagline, and buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/IntroSection.tsx: Intro video section with embed or direct video, fallback link, tagline, and synopsis excerpt.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Reusable section header with styled title and accent underline.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth scrolling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/VideoSection.tsx: Video player section that loads selected episode or default video, with error handling and fallback link.
frontend/src/components/WorldbuildingSec: Displays worldbuilding data from animeSiteConfig, rendering clan info, eye rules, power and rank systems, and Shiranagi family details.
frontend/src/content/animeSiteConfig.ts: Provides static configuration for the anime site including title, intro media, worldbuilding details, and character data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting, fetching, updating, and administrating contact requests via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, fonts, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeIntroEmbedUr: Converts video URLs into embeddable formats for YouTube and Vimeo, leaving direct video links unchanged.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Provides smooth scrolling to a specified page section with an adjustable offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks the projectâ€™s state and feature requests related to adding donation text with Cash App handle $WOTWM.
